constantValues: A clinical condition, problem, diagnosis, or other event, situation, issue, or clinical concept that has risen to a level of concern.

foreignKeyAttribute.name: appointment

constantValues: A booking of a healthcare event among patient(s), practitioner(s), related person(s) and/or device(s) for a specific date/time. This may result in one or more Encounter(s).

foreignKeyAttribute.description: A booking of a healthcare event among patient(s), practitioner(s), related person(s) and/or device(s) for a specific date/time. This may result in one or more Encounter(s).

members.name: assertedDate

constantValues: The date on which the existence of the Condition was first asserted or acknowledged.

members.description: The date on which the existence of the Condition was first asserted or acknowledged.

foreignKeyAttribute.name: carePlan

constantValues: Describes the intention of how one or more practitioners intend to deliver care for a particular patient, group or community for a period of time, possibly limited to care for a specific condition.

foreignKeyAttribute.description: Describes the intention of how one or more practitioners intend to deliver care for a particular patient, group or community for a period of time, possibly limited to care for a specific condition.
